title: These ADC buffs gonna put Assassins back in the meta? More for Pro Play but also for SoloQ.
body: What do you guys think? I just wanna see the world's best mids back on play makers mannnnn

replies.body: This might not actually happen because there is a new item which turn 20% of damage taken into bleed damage so adcs might actually be able to survive the bursts of the assassins and if they have enough lifesteal there is a very high chance they can survive. Other than that the new phantom dancer reduce the damage dealt by 12% from the last enemy you attacked.
I question the balance these items bring into the game....

Well the item that turn 20% damage taken into bleed for 6s has been nerf to turn only 12% damage taken into bleed dmg for 3s. We will know it is balance or not when all the preseason changes come  to the live server.

I would like to see an Assassin meta it would be quite to my allies dieing and saying "op Assassins need nerf."
Because the summoner was out of position and got picked off and died in like 1 second. #Top Bronze Moments.
That's not exactly balanced, if you get 1 shot in a single combo by a champ who isnt fed with 0 counterplay like the old Talon and Kass for example.
There might not be counter play but there is ways to delay it so you can do something after they waste there entire combo on nothing.

Assassins are disgusting and do nothing but do what mages do in a more annoying manner while forcing the few that do play mages to build Zhonya's every time.

I never see Zed building a damn maw of malmortius so why the hell does ziggs need Zhonya's.

On the other hand, ADCs are bursted by both so meh

Well that's a rather terrible outlook on a  whole role and playstyle...

1. No they don't always need to build Zhonya's most assassinations can be avoided through smart play and/or teamwork.
2. The Armour would be useless against Magic Damage assassins.
3. Assassins are high risk, high reward, if a Zed was able to kill your AD Carry in a teamfight, then he deserved to, since he made himself completely available to your team for enough time to cc him and kill him since he is squishy as hell
4. I've seen plenty of Zeds build Maw
5. The tradeoff is that mages will be 167289x more impactful in teamfights and will scale better.
